casebody.data:
No. 509,

Mise.

Fazio v. McNeill, Superintendent, Matteawan State Hospital. Julius J. Eingoren for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, and Ruth Kessler Toch, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Court of Appeals of New York. Certiorari denied.
